column5: Who says Houston is not a walkable city?! 3 Minute walk to the METRO LIGHT RAIL that takes you to Downtown Houston and connects to NRG Stadium. Downtown night life minutes away no need to drive and pay for parking!   This place is close to Downtown Houston, Metro light rail, hobby airport , the airport, nightlife, discovery green, Toyota center and NRG Stadium.   It has a private entrance in and out and own key. Area includes 2 Bedrooms and one Private Bathroom with a shower.
column8: Cozy Private Area - 3 Miles away from Downtown!
